entry.title: [GLOBAL][Web Hosting] - Zimbra maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 29, 20:00 - 21:00 UTC

Jan 22, 10:45 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Web Hosting offer.

Start time: 29/01/2026 20:00 UTC
End time: 29/01/2026 21:00 UTC
Service impact: During this maintenance, zimbra mailboxes will be unreachable for approximately 2 minutes per server. No mail will be lost.
Service improvement: As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be applying a patch to enhance the security and performance of our Zimbra service.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [GLOBAL][Domains] - Domains Name incident notification on .COM/.NET
entry.content:
Jan 27, 09:34 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our .COM/.NET Domains offer, customers in the impacted zone are unable to perform some tasks on .COM/.NET domains.

Here are some supplementary details :
Start time : 27/01/2026 10:25 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Multiple operations (Registration, Renew, Transfer, Restore, Delete) are temporarily unavailable for .COM/.NET domains.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to perform specified operations on .COM/.NET domains.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by our provider.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

entry.title: [GLOBAL][VoIP] - Migration CLUSTER to CLUSTER
entry.content:
Jan 15, 20:34 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.
All the services are now operational.

Dec 15, 21:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Dec 6, 00:22 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our VoIP offer.

Start time : 15/12/2025 21:00 UTC
End time : 17/02/2026 22:00 UTC
Service impact : Customers will experience a 10 minute down during maintenance.
Service improvement : We need to upgrade the firmware on our Yealink phones. We need to realize 2 upgrade to install the good version of the firmware, except for the CP860 model where only 1 upgrade is enough. The maintenance campain will take several days at the same timeslot every day from 21:00 UTC to 22:00 UTC.
The planning for each model is as follows :

Yealink CP860 :
Single update date :15/12/2025

Yealink CP920 :
First update date :14/01/2025
Second update date :15/01/2025

Yealink T41P :
First update date :19/01/2025
Second update date :20/01/2025

Yealink T41S :
First update date :21/01/2025
Second update date :22/01/2025

Yealink T46G :
First update date :26/01/2025
Second update date :27/01/2025

Yealink T46S :
First update date :28/01/2025
Second update date :29/01/2025

Yealink T53 :
First update date :02/02/2025
Second update date :03/02/2025

Yealink T53W :
First update date :04/02/2025
Second update date :05/02/2025

Yealink W56P :
First update date :09/02/2025
Second update date :10/02/2025

Yealink W60P & W53P :
First update date :11/02/2025
Second update date :12/02/2025

For Enterprise and Business customer, all models concerned :
First update date :16/02/2025
Second update date :17/02/2025

Thank you for your understanding.
